Package gr.aueb.javaeight

package gr.aueb.javaeight
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ArrayBasedPanel
    Creates a panel using arrays to hold components.
    BarChartPanel
    Creates a panel that draws a bar chart on itself.
    BottomPanelBDModel
    Creates a panel used to be the bottom panel of Budget Distribution frame/window.
    BottomPanelBOModel
    Creates a panel used to be the bottom panel of Budget Origin frame/window.
    BudgetDistributionWindowModel
    Creates the second window of the application, the Budget Distribution Window.
    BudgetOriginWindowModel
    Creates the first window of the application, the Budget Origin Window.
    ButtonHandler
    Picks between three different types of buttons.
    CalculationsSpinner
    Creates spinner that calculates (sub)totals automatically by changing its value.
    ComparisonArrayPanel
    Creates a panel where data from country .csv file is being represented.
    ComparisonCombobox
    Creates a combobox structure used to select a country to be compared to domestic.
    Constants
    Keeps constants and final stuctures used through the entire application
    CountryComparisonWindowModel
    Creates a window that holds a couple of panels.
    DataFileBuilder
    Builds .csv file if it does not exist (e.g. when running from IDE).
    DataSortAndSaveService
    Sorts and saves data into data file.
    FileDataProvider
    Gets data from a data file and puts them into two types of structure.
    FileNameProvider
    Gets file names of data folder to be put on country comparison combobox.
    FileRecordAdder
    Adds a record to a data file.
    GraphCreator
    Creates charts of different types using data from .csv file.
    InteractiveButton
    Creates a button that includes a listener and a button handler.
    JarDataFolderCopier
    Extracts resources from a .jar file, in order to be written to, not just read-only.
    MassUpdater
    Performs mass update of all values in GUI.
    PanelValuesProvider
    Gets values from panel components and uses them to update data file.
    PDFCreator
    Creates budget report in PDF format using Apache PDFBox.
    Pfad
    Starts the application using main method.
    PieChartPanel
    Creates a panel that draws a pie chart on itself.
    SpinnerValuesInitializer
    Initializes spinners with proper values from data file.
    TopPanelBDModel
    Creates a panel used to be the bottom panel of Budget Distribution frame/window.
    TopPanelBOModel
    Creates a panel used to be the top panel of Budget Origin frame/window.
    YearAdder
    Keeps data file and year selection menu sorted and updated while adding a new year.
    YearProvider
    Provides other classes with years existing in a data file
    YearSelectionCombobox
    Creates a menu to select year to show data
